tool_description: Estimates project completion time based on complexity, skill level, available work time, and task dependencies.

project_complexity.description: Overall project complexity: simple, moderate, or complex

skill_level.description: Woodworker skill level: beginner, intermediate, or advanced

total_components.description: Number of components to be made

joint_complexity.description: Joinery complexity: simple, moderate, or complex

finish_complexity.description: Finishing complexity: simple, moderate, or complex

first_time_project.description: Whether this is first time making this type of project

error_messages: Invalid complexity levels: Use simple, moderate, or complex for complexity parameters
Invalid skill level: Use beginner, intermediate, or advanced
Invalid work hours: Hours per week must be positive number
Invalid component count: Number of components must be positive integer
Unrealistic timeline: Estimated timeline may be too short or too long for specified parameters
usage: Specify project and skill parameters along with available work time. The tool estimates realistic completion timeline with milestone dates.

milestone_timeline.description: Key milestones and their estimated completion dates

time_breakdown.description: Time allocation for different project phases
